scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run start:dev" "cd ./client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run build" "cd ./client && npm run build"
scripts.build-only: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run build" "cd ./client && npm run build-only"
scripts.build-start: npm run build && npm run start:prod
